title: Traits and Features
content: Trait Your nimble nature makes you skilled at concealment. You have proficiency in Stealth checks. Lightfoot Halfling Lvl 1 Strongheart Resilience Trait You have advantage on saving throws against Poison and resistance to Poison damage. Strongheart Halfling Lvl 1 Channel Divinity Charges Feature You gain the ability to channel divine energy, starting with two effects: Turn Undead and an effect determined by your domain.
